column4: hey guys, whenever I install ubuntu, the login manager seems to not work. I checked the intigrity of the disk also. It has happened every single install, even trying 3 cds
what do you mean by "not work"?
Are you able to switch the vt? Ctrl+Alt+F1
there's no unlock on login screen.
it should show an unlock dialog box. If it doesn't discuss it in #ubuntu-bugs and then file a bug.
